metadata.title: CVE-2020-24335 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in uIP through 1.0, as used in Contiki andContiki-NG. Domain name parsing lacks bounds checks, allowing an attackerto corrupt memory with crafted DNS packets.

criterions.comment: open-iscsi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
